title: Will the lyricist write according to the music composed and the situation or after the lyrics is written will the music be composed accordingly? - Quora

response.answer_text: To put it in a word: “Yes.” It’s done both ways, and it’s probably to your benefit if you can do both. As a musician, I’ve done both; writing music and had others write lyrics to it, (they usually find this difficult) and writing music to lyrics I’ve found. (I’ve often written “instrumentals” which were originally to lyrics written by others which I could not get the rights to.)
in my experience, both can be done. sometimes the lyrics are written because of the suggestion of music being created, but sometimes strong lyrics can create appropriate music.
